sentence: In  the  wake  of  the  Oct.  7  attack,  which  Israel  says  killed  more  than  1,200  people,  and  the  subsequent  war  in  Gaza,  where  Israel's  offensive  has  killed  more  than  23,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry,  the  Israeli  government  says  it  has  shelved  its  judicial  reform  plans  —  for  now.

In  the  wake  of  the  Oct.  7  attack,  which  Israel  says  killed  more  than  1,200  people,  and  the  subsequent  war  in  Gaza,  where  Israel's  offensive  has  killed  more  than  23,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry,  the  Israeli  government  says  it  has  shelved  its  judicial  reform  plans  —  for  now.
